contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish|Roosendaal}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Rozendaal | image_skyline = Rozendaal, kasteel Rozendaal foto6 2010-04-18 10.22.JPG | image_caption = Castle Rozendaal | image_flag = Rozendaal vlag.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Rozendaal | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Rozendaal.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Rozendaal |image_map = LocatieRozendaal.png |mapsize = 250px |latd=52|latm=0|lats=|latNS=N |longd=05|longm=58|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Gelderland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 27.95 |area_land_km2 = 27.92 |area_water_km2 = 0.02 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 1533 |population_density_km2 = 55 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Rozendaal''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Rozendaal.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a town in the eastern [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[Gelderland]]. The town, next to [[Arnhem]] and [[Velp, Gelderland|Velp]], is known for the Castle of Rozendaal (''Kasteel Rosendael'') and its ''bedriegertjes''. The municipality is the least [[population density|densely populated]] on the mainland of the Netherlands, i.e., in effect, not on one of the [[West Frisian Islands]]. == Population centres == *[[Imbosch]] *Rozendaal *[[Terlet]] ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.rozendaal.nl Official Website] {{nl}} {{Geographic location | Centre = Rozendaal | North = [[Apeldoorn]] | Northeast = [[Brummen]] | East = [[Rheden]] | South = [[Rheden]] | West = [[Arnhem]] }} {{Gelderland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Gelderland]] [[Category:Populated places in Gelderland]] {{Gelderland-geo-stub}}
